original_title: Brum: Crazy Chair Chase and Other Stories
overview: From the creators of "Teletubbies," this live-action comedy chronicles the life of Brum, a courageous little vehicle that gets in one madcap mess after another as it tries to rescue unwitting residents from sticky situations. In this collection, the new addition of a remote-control chair at the local hair salon proves to be a bad idea when it seems the chair has a mind of its own. Will Brum save the day yet again?
title: Brum: Crazy Chair Chase and Other Stories
